title: Hired by Her Husband
description: Back in her husband's bed!Once, Sophy and George Savas were happily married.... Then Sophy woke up and realized that her blissful marriage was a sham. She's never looked back -- until the day she learns her husband has been critically injured, and her world is shaken....Now, though he's stubborn and proud, George wants Sophy's help. He knows she won't come willingly, so he hires her to be his wife for as long as he needs her! But playing happy families is dangerous, and soon George realizes that his need for Sophy runs deep and strong....
author: Anne McAllister
